titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Hearing Aid Dispenser - Description

body.p: A Hearing Aid Dispenser is a CARE PROFESSIONAL who is registered with the Health and Care Professions Council .
A Hearing Aid Dispenser Â works in private practice.

li.p: assesses and tests an individual's hearing and, depending on the results of their assessment, may prescribe and fit a hearing aid system to assist the hearing impairment accompanied by rehabilitation support
